dashboard.welcomeMessage: Welcome to Your Hotel Loyalty Rewards Program!
dashboard.welcomeDescription: Start earning valuable points and unlock exclusive member benefits. Manage your profile, track your rewards progress, and discover personalized offers created just for you.

profile.title: My Profile

surveys.title: Customer Surveys
surveys.subtitle: Help us improve by sharing your feedback - you can retake surveys anytime!
surveys.noPublicSurveys: No surveys are currently available. We'll notify you when new surveys become available!
surveys.noInvitedSurveys: You haven't been invited to participate in any surveys yet. Check back soon!

errors.loadFailed: Unable to load surveys. Please check your connection and try again.
errors.saveFailed: Unable to save your progress. Please try again.
errors.required: This question is required - please provide an answer
errors.invalid: Please provide a valid answer for this question

completed.title: Survey Completed Successfully!
completed.message: Thank you for sharing your valuable feedback with us. Your responses help us improve our services and create better experiences for all our guests.
completed.saved: Your responses have been saved and will be reviewed by our team
completed.nextSteps: We may follow up with additional questions based on your responses
completed.thankYou: Thank you for being part of our loyalty community!

tabs.invitedDescription: Surveys you've been specifically invited to

admin.title: Survey Management Console

basicInfo.title: Basic Information
basicInfo.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe the purpose of this survey...

accessTypeOptions.public: Public - Available to all users in the app
accessTypeOptions.inviteOnly: Invite Only - Specific users must be invited

accessTypeDescriptions.public: Public surveys appear in the user's "Take Survey" menu and are accessible to all users.
accessTypeDescriptions.inviteOnly: Invite-only surveys are only visible to users who receive specific invitations from administrators.

admin.surveyTitlePlaceholder: Enter a clear, descriptive title that explains what this survey is about
admin.descriptionPlaceholder: Explain the purpose of this survey and what kind of feedback you're looking for
admin.public: Public Survey - Open to all app users
admin.publicDescription: Public surveys are visible to all users in their survey dashboard and can be completed by anyone with access to the app.
admin.inviteOnlyDescription: Private surveys are only accessible to users who receive a direct invitation link from administrators. Perfect for targeted feedback collection.

validation.optionRequired: Please fill in all answer options

invitations.title: Survey Invitations
invitations.noInvitations: No invitations have been sent for this survey
invitations.publicSurveyDescription: Public surveys are automatically available to all users in the app. No invitations are needed - users can find and take this survey directly from their "Take Survey" menu.

couponAssignment.title: Survey Rewards
couponAssignment.description: Assign coupons that users will automatically receive when they complete this survey
couponAssignment.noAvailableCoupons: No active coupons available to assign
couponAssignment.alwaysOnCompletion: Coupons will be automatically awarded when users complete the survey (100% answered).
couponAssignment.maxAwardsHelp: Leave blank for unlimited awards, or set a cap on total rewards
couponAssignment.customExpiryHelp: Override the coupon's expiry with a custom duration from award date
couponAssignment.reasonPlaceholder: Why are you assigning this coupon to this survey?
couponAssignment.noAssignmentsHelp: Assign coupons to automatically reward users who complete this survey
couponAssignment.confirmRemove: Are you sure you want to remove this coupon assignment? Users will no longer receive this reward for completing the survey.
couponAssignment.assignError: Failed to assign coupon to survey

templates.title: Survey Templates
templates.subtitle: Start with a pre-built template or create your own
templates.createCustomSurvey: Create a custom survey with your own questions
templates.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this template?

satisfaction.name: Customer Satisfaction Survey
satisfaction.description: Measure overall customer satisfaction with your services

q1.text: How satisfied are you with our service?

q2.text: How likely are you to recommend us to others?

q3.text: What did you like most about your experience?

nps.name: Net Promoter Score (NPS)
nps.description: Measure customer loyalty and likelihood to recommend

q1.text: How likely are you to recommend our hotel to a friend or colleague?
q1.description: 0 = Not at all likely, 10 = Extremely likely

q2.text: What is the primary reason for your score?

q3.text: Which aspect influenced your rating the most?

postStay.name: Post-Stay Feedback
postStay.description: Gather detailed feedback after guest checkout

q1.text: How would you rate your overall stay?

q2.text: Which amenities did you use during your stay?

q3.text: Did you experience any issues during your stay?

q4.text: Please describe any issues you experienced

q5.text: Would you stay with us again?

eventFeedback.name: Event Feedback Survey
eventFeedback.description: Collect feedback from event or conference attendees

q1.text: How did you hear about this event?

q2.text: How would you rate the event overall?

q3.text: How satisfied were you with the venue and facilities?

q4.text: Would you attend a similar event in the future?

quickPulse.name: Quick Pulse Check
quickPulse.description: Short 2-3 question survey for quick feedback

q2.description: Please share in a few words
